0.title: GreenDelta - Berlin
0.body: <tag>Sofwtare and Web development</tag> : Work in different open-source projects, in the sustainability development. New feature for the openLCA (Java), software that performs Life Cycle Assessment, and creation of a light web version of openLCA in the construction field (React).

1.body: <tag>Software internationalization</tag> : Implementation of a RESTful API respecting the FHIR communication standard in order to allow a dialogue between a directory software and any other FHIR compatible third party application. Software development (Java).

0.title: <tag>Web CV</tag>, 2020 - 1 month
0.body: Web CV creation, with React. It is a personnal project, in order to master React. Deployement in production with the help of Netlify, on a custom domain name registered on Google Domains.

1.title: <tag>Kine 2.0</tag>, 2020 - 3 month
1.body: Creation of 2 websites : one for the physiotherapist, so they can manage their patients, and monitor their activities, and one for the patients, so they can do their rehabilitation exercise at home. This project was carried out at the request of our client Vestib+, which is a Kinesitherapy practice specializing in balance disorders.

2.title: <tag>Guc Voile</tag>, 2019 - 2.5 month
2.body: Creation of a website that helps the sailing club member to rent some sailing equipment in advance, and helps the club owners to monitor the sailing equipment. Generated with the help of JHipster.

3.title: <tag>COLORicm</tag>, 2018 - 3 weeks
3.body: As a group Leader of a team of 6, we developped a 2D video game in java (swing), with real-time controls and modular features, involving automatons, introducing the notion of artificial intelligence.
